Name: Price of Power
About the game: You and Maria dreamed of becoming adventurers one day, but life had other plans. Stripped of your family, best friend, and dreams for the future, you had to forge your own path. Ten years later, though you've become the youngest master hunter in history, you find yourself wishing for more. When you bump into your long-lost childhood friend on a routine trip to the store, she pulls you out of your rut and into the adventure - and romance - of a lifetime. Price of Power features wholesome, slow-burn romance. If you're looking for instant gratification, you won't find it here; youâ€™ll develop deep understandings of the world and women before you reach any climaxes . Adventure Explore the mysterious Southlands with your best friend, your childhood hero, and other companions you pick up along the way. Though you believe the Southlands have been abandoned for centuries, you'll quickly discover that all is not as it seems. You'll rediscover ancient secrets, fight dangerous monsters, and navigate the subtleties of court politics. Fortunately, with the assistance of your trusty group of companions - all of whom happen to be gorgeous women - there's no challenge you can't overcome! Romance After ten years apart, the spark between you and Maria is stronger than ever. Your relationship will undergo a true trial by fire, but you're confident that your love will overcome any obstacle. And who knows, Maria may not be the only woman who's interested in you... As you play Price of Power, you'll be able to unlock one of three romance paths in the game: a Maria-only 'purity' route, a Maria + Emilia 'throuple' route, and a 'harem' route. Maria will always be your number one lady, but will that be enough to satisfy you?
